file_content.text: Oh, Boss! Big Boss! Shiny Jedi man say he too busy with important Jedi things to speak to Blizz, but Blizz find him anyway.
Blizz can show Big Boss where shiny Jedi man at, if Big Boss want!
Okay, Blizz, let's find this man.
Can Boss take Blizz to smuggle-moon on ship? Blizz really want to see Big Boss fancy ship!
Blizz know drink place shiny Jedi man like. Blizz hear people say it seedy, but Blizz not see any plants. Maybe they not grow yet?
I'll take you to the bar, you point him out.
It means a bad element has taken root-- that isn't helping. I'll explain some other time.
That okay! Blizz not really like gardening.
Seedy... can't you build yourself a protocol droid or something?
Blizz had talky-droid before, but Blizz need parts for sand blower Blizz invent... then oil-pump in Sand Crawler need tubes... then Blizz need to prop up table....
Big Boss lead the way, Blizz follow!
He's not the only one who's busy. Let's leave him be for now.
Okay! Big Boss just say word and Blizz can find Jedi man!
Big Boss ready to go find shiny Jedi man now?
[Refuse Quest] Not right now.
Hi, Boss!
Is Guss's master around?
Nope!
Blizz? What are you doing here?
Blizz want to check on Big Boss, old Jedi man say boss out on errand with fish head man, so Blizz wait here.
Do I want to know why you smell like a bar?
Blizz fix little cold box for old Jedi man, so old Jedi man say Blizz can have bottle from box.
Old Jedi man say he tired of waiting, so he go to meditation spot.
Oh, he doesn't like to be disturbed when he goes out for meditation. Sometimes he's gone for days. He says I'm not ready to join him.
Big Boss want Blizz... boss want Blizz to take boss and fish-head to old Jedi man?
That would be appreciated.
I swear I'm going to kill him when we get there.
Blizz race boss! Wheee!
